parameter_description: Selects Freeze or Infinite for press-and-hold.

notes: Controls Pre-Delay on most machines; Decay on Magneto/Nonlinear.

usage: 0: AAHHOO; 1: AAHH; 2: AAHHOH; 3: OH; 4: OOOHOH; 5: OOOO; 6: Random
0: Swoosh; 1: Reverse; 2: Ramp; 3: Gate; 4: Gauss; 5: Bounce

parameter_description: LFO speed for NL and late reverb.

notes: PC map is within selected MIDI Patch Bank (via CC#0). BigSky powers up in MIDI Bank 0.
usage: PC 0: 00A; PC 1: 00B; PC 2: 00C; PC 3: 01A; PC 4: 01B; PC 5: 01C; ... up to PC 127
